the individual cubes are getting set up .
we are envisioning the final product .
output.sentences: Becky was moving into her new apartment and taking pictures of the place for record keeping.
Becky went downstairs to start unloading her truck as one of her apartment walls starting to change color.
Becky hardly notices the change as she's unloading her Uhaul, what catches her attention is every trip back her stuff is unpacked and organized.
She looks at her apartment in disbelief, "This is not how I would organize my stuff!" Becky yelled as she took a good look around.
Suddenly, as if by magic, her items rearrange themselves to better suit her preferences. Becky smiles and says, "that's better!"
